io.soliton.protobuf

Class EnvelopeServerHandler<I,O>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.netty.channel.ChannelHandlerAdapter
      • io.netty.channel.ChannelInboundHandlerAdapter
        • io.netty.channel.SimpleChannelInboundHandler<I>
          • io.soliton.protobuf.EnvelopeServerHandler<I,O>
  • Type Parameters:
    I - The incoming request type in which the RPC envelope is encoded
    O - The outgoing response type in which the RPC envelope will be encoded
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChannelHandler, ChannelInboundHandler

    public abstract class EnvelopeServerHandler<I,O>
extends SimpleChannelInboundHandler<I>
    Shared server-side handler implementation for servers whose method calls are encoded using an Envelope message.
    Author:
    Julien Silland (julien@soliton.io)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected static class  EnvelopeServerHandler.RequestConversionException
      Occurs when an incoming request couldn't be converted into an envelope.

      • accept

        protected boolean accept(I request)
        Should be overridden by subclasses to refuse the processing of a given request. This implementation return true in all cases.
        Parameters:
        request - the received request
        Returns:
        true if the request should be processed, false otherwise.
